/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The street is lined with lush green trees and buildings, adding a touch of nature and urban architecture to the landscape. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their day, while cars are driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
